subdisciplines.name: Particle astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: Study of high-energy particles from sources such as supernovae, black holes, and active galactic nuclei

subdisciplines.name: X-ray astronomy
subdisciplines.description: Study of high-energy electromagnetic radiation from sources such as neutron stars, supernova remnants, and active galactic nuclei

subdisciplines.name: Gamma-ray astronomy
subdisciplines.description: Study of high-energy gamma rays from sources such as gamma-ray bursts, supernova remnants, and active galactic nuclei
